posts.post_content:
Hello all!!!

I have been following this "error" for about 10 + years now......  I have seen and have documentation of a few more......

this particular error has part of the "H" and part of the "E" in hemphill missing in the caption name ! and different problem with the plate.....

and displayed with different backs !!

here are 6 of them!!!.....this is a great piece of the printer puzzel:eek:

I'm willing to sell or trade for a rare back...


thinking of $1200.00 or cash trade rare back or all rare back (lenox , red hindu, uzit, maybe bl 350 or 2 )....


im going to try to post some scans....if not email me me for scans

[url]jvanderbeck@verizon.net[/url]

Hey Johnny, Good luck with the sale/trade. Does the SC have the factory
number or is there paper loss there too? What are the backs on the others
you have documented?

thanks my friend!:)  sorry....paper loss on the sc .....I believe the others were pied 150's if I'm not mistaken?? :confused:  i'll check


:)

btw....you have become one of the great researchers for us on this awesome set! my kudos to you for all your hard work in "reverse" engineering these sheets/cards/print process.....you are among the elite;)

Good luck w/ sale.  Certainly a tough one to find ... let alone 6!

Best 
SGL
Never mind thought this thread was in the discussion section not bst.  good luck with the sale.

me an offer! I love a good trade....

no offer / trade not seriously considered...

if these get recognition more, it good be a jackpot for some lucky collector!


:)

taking any reasonable offer!:)

get these before the national trade bait

first $600.00 takes all 6!!:eek:!!!! $100.00 a card!:eek:

or I will trade on a lower condition broadleaf 350 or red hindu:)

email

[url]jvanderbeck@verizon.net[/url]

murr'y error sells for 3k-5 k each.......if this error gets categorized....JACKPOT;)
